course.title: Art of Indian Esoteric Buddhism
course.description: This seminar explores the art of Indian Esoteric Buddhism from various interpretive vantage points. After a brief survey of the earliest phase of its development, the discussion will focus on unpacking the recent scholarly discourses on Esoteric or Tantric Buddhism in relation to the artistic productions in medieval South Asia (ca. 800-1200CE). The two main topics for the semester will be the Saiva-Buddhist interactions as manifested in iconographic (and artistic) articulations, and the validity of semiotic and historical interpretations of iconography and ritual of Indian Esoteric Buddhism.
